xmlText.p: First Period_1, Calgary, Brodie 3 (Brouwer), 8:17. Penalties_Winnipeg bench, served by Perreault (too many men on the ice), 7:12; Monahan, CGY, (holding), 7:56.
Second Period_2, Winnipeg, Perreault 14 (Ehlers, Little), 10:47. Penalties_Morrissey, WPG, (holding), 7:44; Hamonic, CGY, (tripping), 12:08; Wheeler, WPG, (slashing), 13:52.
Shootout_Winnipeg 2 (Little G, Laine NG, Wheeler G), Calgary 0 (Jankowski NG, Monahan NG).
Goalies_Winnipeg, Hellebuyck 24-6-6 (31 shots-30 saves). Calgary, Smith 20-13-4 (35-34).
Referees_Trevor Hanson, Brad Meier. Linesmen_Shandor Alphonso, Kiel Murchison.
